tool.name: Get a document
tool.help:
**What it does**
Retrieves a single document from the FDR corpus.
There are 107 documents in the FDR corpus with id values in the range 000-106. No document titles are available at this time.
You can also use the *Get Data->FDR: List* tool to obtain a list of valid document ID values.
**License**
All documents in the FDR corpus are in `the public domain <https://copyright.gov/pr/pdomain.html>`_
